company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

company_manager = #{companyManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sys_enterprise set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_manager = #{companyManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_img = #{orgImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_owner_img = #{orgOwnerImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_enterprise 1=1
and company_name like '%${companyName}%'
ORDER BY create_time DESC

select
from sys_enterprise where status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC
